creator: udariramesh@gmail.com
text:
Hi,

I am using tomcat 7.0.55 version for deploying our web based application(JIRA 6) and in our application we are trying to connect external databases(sql server) by using sqljdbc4.jar and jtds-1.2.5.jar. We tried by using both drivers, in both cases we are getting java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: net.sourceforge.jtds.jdbc.Driver exception while loading driver even we have both these JARS in C:\apache-tomcat-7.0.55\lib folder. Same is working with tomcat-5.5.29 version wehn we places these boths jars in  C:\apache-tomcat-5.5.29\common\lib folder.

Even it is not working, if we use data source concept. Same is working tomcat-5.5.29 version. Seems that JARs present under tomcat\lib folder not loading into classpath.
Please help us what was changed in tomcat 7.0.55 version. We are struggling with this issue from past 10 days not get any solution till now.

Regards,
Ramesh
